author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

Two obsolete and unused packages containing Roman-Pot alignment data are removed.

(CT)PPS now uses DB for storing alignment corrections, thus no need for the removed packages is expected in the future.

Since the removed packages are not used, no change in test results is expected with this PR.


#### PR validation:

``runTheMatrix.py --ibeos -l limited`` gave ``35 34 33 25 17 4 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed``
title: PPS: removal of obsolete alignment data
